1586440.name: Smelter's Mix Tape - The Official Soundtrack
1586440.description:
The Smelter Official Soundtrack is available for purchase on Steam!

Containing 35 tracks, this album features over two hours of music by distinguished composer Evader (Delta V: Rings of Saturn), with opening and ending themes by Manami Matsumae (Mega Man, Shovel Knight), featuring Koichi Namiki (Galaxy Force II) on guitar.

Combining his slick electronic style with a combination of synth, rock and orchestra, Evader's soundtrack perfectly sets the mood for Smelter, an action x strategy hybrid.
